languages.text: Лорд-капитан, варп-прыжок к станции Скит рассчитан быть не может. Мы не различаем его тень в блаженном сиянии {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Астрономикона{/g} — все застят бури варпа. Считаем, наш единственный шанс — затяжной прыжок к Футфолу. Вероятность пережить его мала, но она хотя бы есть. Да хранит нас Император.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-Капитан, варп-прыжок к планете Скит рассчитан быть не может. Мы не различаем его тень в блаженном сиянии Астрономикона — все застят бури варпа. Считаем, наш единственный шанс — затяжной прыжок к Футфолу. Вероятность пережить его мала, но она хотя бы есть. Да хранит нас Император.

languages.text: Lord Captain, a warp jump to the Hermitage cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not non-existent. Emperor preserve us.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан, варп-прыжок к станции Скит рассчитан быть не может. Мы не различаем его тень в блаженном сиянии {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Астрономикона{/g} — все застят бури варпа. Считаем, наш единственный шанс — затяжной прыжок к Футфолу. Вероятность пережить его мала, но она хотя бы есть. Да хранит нас Император.

traits.locale_text: Lord Captain, a warp jump to Skit cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the Astronomican — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not nonexistent. The Emperor preserve us.

Lord Captain, a warp jump to Skit cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the Astronomican — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not nonexistent. The Emperor preserve us.

Lord Captain, a warp jump to Skit cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the Astronomican — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not nonexistent. The Emperor preserve us.

Lord Captain, a warp jump to the Hermitage cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not non-existent. The Emperor preserve us.

Lord Captain, a warp jump to the Hermitage cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not non-existent. Emperor preserve us.

languages.text: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, no podemos calcular un salto de disformidad hasta el Hermitage. No detectamos su sombra en el sagrado resplandor del {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomicón{/g}, las tormentas de disformidad lo obstruyen todo. Creemos que la única opción que nos queda es realizar un salto más largo, hasta Paso. Aunque la probabilidad de sobrevivir a semejante salto es baja, por lo menos existe. Que el Emperador nos proteja.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, a warp jump to the Hermitage cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not non-existent. Emperor preserve us.

traits.locale_text: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, no podemos calcular un salto de disformidad hasta el Hermitage. No detectamos su sombra en el sagrado resplandor del {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomicón{/g}, las tormentas de disformidad lo obstruyen todo. Creemos que la única opción que nos queda es realizar un salto más largo, hasta Paso. Aunque la probabilidad de sobrevivir a semejante salto es baja, por lo menos existe. Que el Emperador nos proteja.

languages.text: 舰长大人，我们无法计算前往隐士庐的亚空间跳跃路线。我们无法在{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星炬{/g}的神圣光芒中探测到隐士庐的影子，亚空间的风暴把一切都遮住了。我们认为，唯一存活的机会就是通过更远的亚空间跳跃前往落脚港。活下来的几率很低，但并非必死无疑。愿帝皇保佑我们。
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, a warp jump to the Hermitage cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not non-existent. Emperor preserve us.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人，我们无法计算前往隐士庐的亚空间跳跃路线。我们无法在{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星炬{/g}的神圣光芒中探测到隐士庐的影子，亚空间的风暴把一切都遮住了。我们认为，唯一存活的机会就是通过更远的亚空间跳跃前往落脚港。活下来的几率很低，但并非必死无疑。愿帝皇保佑我们。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテン、エルミタージュへのワープジャンプを算出できません。{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星辰波{/g}の神聖な輝きの中に歪みの影を検出できませんでした。〈歪み〉の嵐が全てを邪魔しています。唯一の可能性は、フットフォールを目指してさらに遠くへジャンプすることですね。生存率は低いですが、ないわけではありません。皇帝よ、お守りください。
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, a warp jump to the Hermitage cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not non-existent. Emperor preserve us.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテン、エルミタージュへのワープジャンプを算出できません。{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星辰波{/g}の神聖な輝きの中に歪みの影を検出できませんでした。〈歪み〉の嵐が全てを邪魔しています。唯一の可能性は、フットフォールを目指してさらに遠くへジャンプすることですね。生存率は低いですが、ないわけではありません。皇帝よ、お守りください。

languages.text: Lord Captain, ein Warpsprung zur Hermitage kann nicht berechnet werden. Wir können ihren Schatten im heiligen Glanz des {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} nicht erkennen — die Warpstürme behindern alles. Wir glauben, dass unsere einzige Chance darin besteht, einen längeren Sprung nach Footfall zu machen. Unsere Überlebenschancen sind gering, aber nicht inexistent. Der Imperator beschütze uns.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, a warp jump to the Hermitage cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not non-existent. Emperor preserve us.

languages.text: {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il nous est impossible de calculer un saut Warp de retour vers l'Ermitage. Nous ne parvenons pas à percevoir son ombre dans la radiance sacrée de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g}... les tempêtes du Warp obscurcissent tout. Nous pensons que notre seule chance est de procéder à un saut plus lointain en direction de Castel. Nos chances de survies sont minces, mais elles ne sont pas nulles. Que l'Empereur nous préserve.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, a warp jump to the Hermitage cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not non-existent. Emperor preserve us.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il nous est impossible de calculer un saut Warp de retour vers l'Ermitage. Nous ne parvenons pas à percevoir son ombre dans la radiance sacrée de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g}... les tempêtes du Warp obscurcissent tout. Nous pensons que notre seule chance est de procéder à un saut plus lointain en direction de Castel. Nos chances de survies sont minces, mais elles ne sont pas nulles. Que l'Empereur nous préserve.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, İnzivagâh'a öte sıçrama hesaplaması yapılamıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomikan'ın{/g} kutsal ışığının içinde, İnzivagâh'ın gölgesini tespit edemiyoruz. Öteboyut fırtınaları her şeyi engelliyor. Tek başarı ihtimalimizin Binliman'a daha uzun bir sıçrama yapmak olduğunu düşünüyoruz. Hayatta kalma olasılığımız düşük ancak sıfır değil. İmparator bizi korusun.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, a warp jump to the Hermitage cannot be calculated. We cannot detect its shadow within the sacred radiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} — the warp's storms are obstructing everything. We think our only chance is to make a longer jump to Footfall. Our chances of survival are low, but not non-existent. Emperor preserve us.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, İnzivagâh'a öte sıçrama hesaplaması yapılamıyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomikan{/g}'ın kutsal ışığının içindeki gölgesini tespit edemiyoruz, öteboyut fırtınaları her şeyi engelliyor. Tek başarı ihtimalimizin Binliman'a daha uzun bir sıçrama yapmak olduğunu düşünüyoruz. Hayatta kalma olasılığımız düşük ancak sıfır değil. İmparator bizi korusun.
